summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5529 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 9, First Subdivision of Washington Park Addition, being the alley between 36th Avenue North and 37th Avenue North, from East Madison Street to East Prospect Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 70847, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
